source.b21e7dd5:
import rx
from rx import of,operators as op 
import operator
source.a2b0506e:
EMIT_BUFFER_COUNT = 1

DATA.pipe(
    op.buffer_with_count(EMIT_BUFFER_COUNT)
).subscribe(
on_next = lambda value: print("result = ", value),
on_error = lambda error: print("error = ", error),
on_completed = lambda: print("comopleted")
)
source.cd186796:

DATA.pipe(
    op.buffer_with_count(EMIT_BUFFER_COUNT,SKIP_BUFFER_COUNT)
).subscribe(
on_next = lambda value: print("result = ", value),
on_error = lambda error: print("error = ", error),
on_completed = lambda: print("comopleted")
)
